artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: three men wearing knickers and wide-brimmed hats sweeping; man drinking inside a doorway at left; other figures in background observing sweepers; text at top and bottom: "14 / COLECCION / 18 / DE CANCIONES MODERNAS. / EDITOR A. VANEGAS / ARROYO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Los Patinadores (The Sweepers), plate 7 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
